sentences.en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentences.cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentences.en: All too often they become enmeshed in deadening routines.
sentences.cn: 他们时常陷入枯燥的日常事务之中。

sentences.en: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentences.cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentences.en: If they value these data, let them pay for them.
sentences.cn: 他们要是看重这些数据，就让他们出钱买。

sentences.en: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.cn: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.en: The savoury smell greeted them as they went through the door.
sentences.cn: 他们进门时一阵香味扑鼻而来。

sentences.en: They all want to come to the wedding.
They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
sentences.cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

sentences.en: They found a labyrinth of tunnels under the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了一处迷宫似的地道。

sentences.en: They get angry if they think they are being treated disrespectfully.
sentences.cn: 他们要是觉得受到了怠慢，就会大动肝火。

sentences.en: They have both behaved very badly and I am very hurt.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都很不友善，让我非常难过。

sentences.en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
sentences.cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

sentences.en: They may headhunt her for the vacant position of Executive Producer.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会挖她去填补执行制片人这一空缺职位。

sentences.en: They were going to sail around the little island, against the tide.
sentences.cn: 他们打算绕着小岛逆潮航行。

sentences.en: They were knocking around together for about a year.
sentences.cn: 他们交往大概有一年了。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: Wind turbines are large and noisy and they disfigure the landscape.
sentences.cn: 风力涡轮机个头大、噪音响，还会破坏周边风景。

trans.tran_cn: 他/她/它们，人们，大家，政府，当局，她们
trans.tran_en: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about
